attributes.action: Stop left wingers from trying to destabilise Britain and America's friendship
attributes.background:
Currently the British people are forced to listen to Jeremy Corbyn and many left wing activists complaining about Donald trump. 

It is clear that if Corbyn and his supporters carry on trying to destablise the friendship between our two country's it will affect our special relationship

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
